import { Flex, Box } from "@radix-ui/themes"; export default function About() { return (

About Me

I am a full stack developer, specializing in JavaScript and React. I take pleasure in the process of creating user-friendly and aesthetically-pleasing websites. As I work my way through a bootcamp course through the University of North Carolina Chapel Hill, I am learning a variety of front-end and back-end technologies. Most importantly, however, I am learning the art of team development. It is a joy to work with other developers to build outstanding applications, sharing and building upon each others' ideas. As a solo developer, I am currently building a unique music application. As music and music education is another passion of mine, I am motivated to use my web development skills to create a tool for music students and educators.

); }
